definition: to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: For this festival, some of my Essay, beginning last weekend.
sentences.chinese: 对这个节日，我的一些随感，始于上周末。

sentences.english: Karnal bunt is spread mainly by the planting of infected seeds.
sentences.chinese: 小麦印度腥黑穗病主要随感病种子传播。

definition: random thoughts/(in book titles etc) impressions/jottings
impression of a book/opinion expressed in a book review
to write freely/to express oneself as one pleases
to recall with emotion/to feel sentiments
my unworthy manuscript (humble expr.)/my humble writing
various notes or records/a miscellany/scattered jottings
my clumsy writing (humble expr.)/my humble pen
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
